con:restRequest.name: ProcessMarketingEventMulTrxn
con:restRequest.con:request: { "MarketingEventChannels": [ { "MarketingEventChannelId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#MarketingEventChannelId}", "ChannelName": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#ChannelName}", } ], "EventName": "OFFER_NAME${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("MMddyyyyhhmmssmmm").format(new Date())}", "EventCode": "OFFER_CODE${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("MMddyyyyhhmmssmmm").format(new Date())}", "PackagedAudience": { "PackagedAudienceId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PackagedAudienceId}", "AudienceName": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#AudienceName}", }, "AudienceSource": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#AudienceSource}", "PackagedOffer": { "PackagedOfferId": "af25e0df-f444-47cd-9713-66f05da67f5e", "PackagedOfferCode": "EARN_MULTI_TXN_POINTS", "PackagedOfferName": "Earn Points on Multiple Transactions", "PackagedOfferParams": [ { "PackagedOfferParamId": "ee442300-9eee-479e-a53b-44253c7f0027", "PackagedOfferId": "af25e0df-f444-47cd-9713-66f05da67f5e", "ParamName": "Transaction threshold", "ParamCode": "TXN_THRESHOLD", "Value": "100", "PanelId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelIdCustAct}", "PanelCode": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelCodeCustAct}", }, { "PackagedOfferParamId":"67c23931-07b0-46bf-9de0-fb510b28e41a", "PackagedOfferId": "af25e0df-f444-47cd-9713-66f05da67f5e", "ParamName": "Point amount", "ParamCode": "POINT_AMT_REWARDED", "Value": "15", "PanelId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelIdCustRew}", "PanelCode": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PanelCodeCustRew}", } ], "PackagedOfferCategoryId": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PackagedOfferCategoryId}", "PackagedOfferCategoryCode": "${ProcessMarketingEventData#PackagedOfferCategoryCode}", }, "OfferStartDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+2)}", "OfferEndDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+4)}", "Status": "A", }

"Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}", "MomentOutcome": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "OutcomeEquationUi": "{{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}}", "FormulaName": "FIXEDAMT", "Status": "A" }, "MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} {{AUDIENCE}}", "CyclicAttribute": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible", "CyclicThreshold": {{TXN_THRESHOLD}}, "CyclicMapField": "EligibleRevenue", "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}] }, "Status": "A" } ] }, "Status": "A", "BestOfferIndicator": false, "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(total_offers) AS total_offers, SUM(total_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(total_offers)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(total_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(total_offers)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(total_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM ( SELECT profile_id, floor(SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{TXN_THRESHOLD}}) AS profile_times_threshold_met FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') and (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') and act_transaction_xref_id is null)) AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY profile_id ) WHERE profile_times_threshold_met > 0 GROUP BY profile_id )

}", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(total_offers) AS total_offers, SUM(total_points) AS total_points,

FROM
(
 SELECT profile_id,
 {{OFFERS_QUERY}}
 FROM
 (
 SELECT profile_id, floor(SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{TXN_THRESHOLD}}) AS profile_times_threshold_met
 FROM t_act_transaction
 WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') and (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') and act_transaction_xref_id is null))
 AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE
 {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
 GROUP BY profile_id
 )
 WHERE profile_times_threshold_met > 0
 GROUP BY profile_id

"FormulaName": "ROUND_ELIGIBLE", "Status": "A" }, "MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && (PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible >={{MIN_TXN_AMT}})", "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}] }, "Status": "A" } ] }, "Status": "A", "BestOfferIndicator": false, "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY PROFILE_ID )

} ", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(
SELECT profile_id,
{{OFFERS_QUERY}}
FROM t_act_transaction
WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null
AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}}
{{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
GROUP BY PROFILE_ID
